channel.title: What do i do go get player online?
channel.description:
okay i downloaded pvpscapez source and client and followed this guide on youtube to port forward [video=youtube;6bQmluuZIs8]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6bQmluuZIs8[/video] then i changed the ip in loader.java in client folder to 127.0.0.1 and i loged ingame and people told me that 127.0.0.1 is only if youwant to by your self so what do i do to make players join my server? i already port forwarded and went to canyouseeme.org to find out if my port is online and my port is online and what do i do now to the 127.0.0.1 in loader.java? please help i will give you rep+ and a thanks. i beg u please help me
[SIZE=7]i will give rep+ and a thanks if you can help me! please help me i beg u![/SIZE]

item.title: What do i do go get player online?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ranqedrs, post:3, topic:511230”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=629476.msg4270478#msg4270478 date=1364493321]
Change it to whatever IP you’re going to be hosting the server on.
[/quote]

what you mean? is it gonna be my ip for my internet or my no-ip cus if i put no-ip in loader.java it gets stuck to 1%[/quote]
Sort of what the guy above me said. You need to have the server online first, before running the client.
You want your no-ip in the loader.java or your IP.
Your IP can be found here: http://whatismyip.com
No-IP just masks that as what ever you made it.
Turn the server on, go to http://canyouseeme.org, and type the port in and check.
Again, like above, if error you did something wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i do go get player online?

item.title: What do i do go get player online?
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

[quote=“ranqedrs, post:3, topic:511230”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=629476.msg4270478#msg4270478 date=1364493321]
Change it to whatever IP you’re going to be hosting the server on.
[/quote]

what you mean? is it gonna be my ip for my internet or my no-ip cus if i put no-ip in loader.java it gets stuck to 1%[/quote]
Do you have the cache downloaded?
Go to www.canyouseeme.org and type in 43594.
If you get error that means you didn’t port forward correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i do go get player online?
